message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $10,000. This price reflects the quality and potential of the product. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but I'm still not able to go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $9,500. This is a fair price that reflects the product's value and still allows me to make a profit. I'm hoping we can find a middle ground.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product's value.
